T02D1241:154b-3: 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma /
T02D1241:154b-4: dpal kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1241:154b-5: ae bam rnam par nges zhugs pa'i //
T02D1241:154b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1241:154b-7: bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs las //
T02D1241:154b-8: sems can bsrung phyir gtor ma brtsam //
T02D1241:154b-9: kye yi rdo rje sbyor ldan pa'i //
T02D1241:154b-10: rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom bya ba //
T02D1241:154b-11: chos kyi 'byung gnas nang du ni //
T02D1241:154b-13: dkar gnag dmar ba aom a'a:h'u% //
T02D1241:154b-14: rim par lha chen brgyad dang ni //
T02D1241:154b-15: phyogs skyong brgyad dang klu chen brgyad//
T02D1241:154b-16: padma'i mdog bzhin bskyed bya ste //
T02D1241:154b-17: shar du dbang phyug chen po bskyed //
T02D1241:154b-18: lhor ni dbang po bsam par bya //
T02D1241:154b-19: nub tu tshangs pa bskyed bya ste //
T02D1241:154b-20: byang phyogs su ni khyab 'jug go //
T02D1241:154b-21: shar lhor 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bskyed //
T02D1241:154b-22: lho nub phyogs kyi bdag po ste //
T02D1241:154b-23: bhrim gi ri ti nub byang du //
T02D1241:154b-24: byang shar gzhon nu karti ka'o //
T02D1241:154b-25: shar gyi 'dab mar brgya byin bsam //
T02D1241:154b-26: lhor ni mthar byed dgod par bya //
T02D1241:154b-27: chu bdag nub kyi 'dab ma la'o //
T02D1241:154b-28: de bzhin byang du gnod sbyin dgod //
T02D1241:154b-29: me yi mtshams su me chen po //
T02D1241:154b-30: bden bral du ni srin po'o //
T02D1241:154b-31: nub byang mtshams su rlung lha ste //
T02D1241:154b-32: byang shar du ni 'byung po'i bdag / stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang //
T02D1241:154b-33: mtha' yas nor rgyas de bzhin te //
T02D1241:154b-34: 'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang //
T02D1241:154b-36: kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis te //
T02D1241:154b-37: rdo rje dril bu phyag na bcas //
T02D1241:154b-38: rang mdog rig mas yan lag 'khyud //
T02D1241:154b-39: gdan la g-yas brkyang ba yis bzhugs //
T02D1241:154b-40: rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las //
T02D1241:154b-41: 'od zer lcags kyu ltar spros nas //
T02D1241:154b-42: lha brgyad dag la gzugs khams dang //
T02D1241:154b-43: gzugs med pa yi lha bsdu'o //
T02D1241:154b-44: 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi //
T02D1241:154b-45: phyogs skyong brgyad la rab tu bsdu //
T02D1241:154b-46: ngan song gsum dang lha ma yin //
T02D1241:154b-47: klu chen brgyad la bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1241:154b-48: rang bzhin gnas na bzhugs pa yi //
T02D1241:154b-49: dkyil 'khor spyan drang bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1241:154b-50: goo r'i yis ni dgug byas la //
T02D1241:154b-51: chom rkun mas ni zhags pas 'ching //
T02D1241:154b-52: ro langs mas ni lcags sgrog sdom //
T02D1241:155a-1: bus myos byed za phod ma'o //
T02D1241:155a-2: rnal 'byor pa yis thugs ka nas //
T02D1241:155a-3: 'od zer lcags kyu ltar spros pas //
T02D1241:155a-4: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dgug / de la phyi nang gsang bas mchod //
T02D1241:155a-5: de dag gis ni dbang bskur mthar //
T02D1241:155a-6: rang rigs bdag pos dbu brgyan pa //
T02D1241:155a-7: lha chen brgyad la rtag pa yis //
T02D1241:155a-8: rdo rje yi ni phyogs skyong brgyad //
T02D1241:155a-9: gar dbang gis ni klu brgyad do //
T02D1241:155a-10: de nas cho gas gtor ma bsgrub //
T02D1241:155a-11: rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1241:155a-12: aa las byung ba'i pad snod bsam //
T02D1241:155a-13: der ni bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um /
T02D1241:155a-14: go ku da ha na las yin//
T02D1241:155a-15: sangs rgyas lnga dang sems can lnga //
T02D1241:155a-16: zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su bsam //
T02D1241:155a-17: nyi dbus h'um bsam rdo rje ste //
T02D1241:155a-18: 'bar ba dang ni spro ba yis //
T02D1241:155a-19: bdud rtsi rab tu bsgrub par bya //
T02D1241:155a-20: chu yi rang bzhin 'di bsgoms pas //
T02D1241:155a-21: aom a'a:h'um gis byin brlabs dbul //
T02D1241:155a-22: de la gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te ;
T02D1241:155a-23: / aom aandi dza ma dza la dzakkha bh'u ta bahni /
T02D1241:155a-28: de ni gtor ma'i mgron no //
T02D1241:155a-29: ai dam bi lam bhunydza dzim gha /
T02D1241:155a-34: de ni bzhes par zhu ba'o //
T02D1241:155a-35: aam bha sappa kadzdza s'a da kh'anti khu ni /
T02D1241:155a-38: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D1241:155a-42: de nas dgyes par byas nas gshegs su gsol ba'i yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1241:155a-43: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D1241:155a-45: badzra satva tve no ba tishtha /
T02D1241:155a-47: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D1241:155a-48: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1241:155a-49: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D1241:155a-50: sarba sidhi mme pra ya tstsha /
T02D1241:155a-51: sarbba karmma su tsa me tsi ttam /
T02D1241:155a-53: ha ha ha ha ho:bha ga w'an sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa /
T02D1241:155a-55: ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a:mu:gtor ma 'di sbyin zhing rab tu mchod par byed na /
T02D1241:155a-56: rnal 'byor pa la 'byung po thams cad legs par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1241:155a-57: de'i tshe la bde ba rnyog pa med pa nyid dang /
T02D1241:155a-60: gal te 'byung po'i tshogs 'di la gtor ma sbyin na /
T02D1241:155b-1: 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1241:155b-3: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya dha ra dang /
